rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

description: This unit aims to equip students with the knowledge to successfully plan and execute their research projects (semesters two and three), and (b) provide them with an understanding of, and the basic skills required for, careers as science and technology professionals.Topics covered by this Unit include; The role of science in society Research methodology Diffusion of innovation and knowledge management Proposal development and project management
